comments.author: gemini-code-assist
comments.body: DefaultTelemetryMiddleware currently only logs to console. Suggest adding emitTelemetry to IMiddlewareContext.

comments.author: coderabbitai
comments.body: startTimes keyed by engineId might be overwritten in concurrent searches. Suggest unique requestId/telemetryId.

comments.author: coderabbitai
comments.body: Telemetry event missing engineId in some error paths.

comments.author: gemini-code-assist
comments.body: Suggest restoring urls.main validation in tests.

comments.author: coderabbitai
comments.body: JSON.stringify hides control characters from ProtocolValidator. Suggest recursive validation of object values.

comments.author: coderabbitai
comments.body: EngineFacade internal middlewares direct access violates facade. Suggest public API or test-only accessor.
